outputs.output_descr: Support to the government by providing expertise to conduct technical assessments of impacts in the agricultural sector, socio-economic assessment of the flood impact, and a transitional recovery framework. This will lay the foundations for a broader early recovery initiative.

Support to the government by providing expertise to conduct technical assessments of impacts in the agricultural sector, socio-economic assessment of the flood impact, and a transitional recovery framework. This will lay the foundations for a broader early recovery initiative.

project_title: Recovery of Fiji Islands following severe Flood
